      • getDBCommentSet

        @Deprecated
public java.util.Set<AbstractDBComment> getDBCommentSet​(com.jalios.jcms.Publication pub,
                                                        com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                                                        boolean checkMember,
                                                        int start)
        Deprecated.
        since dbcomment-5.2 use getDBCommentSet(Publication, Member, int) instead
        Returns all comments bound to the given publication.
        Parameters:
        pub - the publication
        mbr - the logged member (to check read access)
        checkMember - set true to check member rights
        start - the first comment to display
        Returns:
        a set of Comments

      • getDBCommentSet

        public java.util.Set<AbstractDBComment> getDBCommentSet​(com.jalios.jcms.Publication pub,
                                                        com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                                                        int start)
        Returns all comments bound to the given publication (but not the ones in trash).
        Parameters:
        pub - the publication
        mbr - the logged member (to check read access)
        start - the first comment to display
        Returns:
        a set of Comments

      • getDBCommentSetByUdate

        public java.util.Set<AbstractDBComment> getDBCommentSetByUdate​(com.jalios.jcms.Publication pub,
                                                               com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                                                               boolean beforeUdate)
        Returns all comments bound to the given publication before or after last udate.
        Parameters:
        pub - the Publication
        mbr - the logged member (to check read access)
        beforeUdate - , if true, returns comments before udate, otherwise, it returns comment after targetContent udate
        Returns:
        all comments bound to the given publication before or after last udate.

                                      com.jalios.jcms.Member loggedMember)

        loggedMember - the Member currently logged
        Returns:
        true if smart comment display must be used on the current Publication for given Member
